be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.sampler

Class FullSetSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.sampler.RandomSampler
      • be.uclouvain.mlg.jForest.sampler.FullSetSampler

  • public class FullSetSampler
extends RandomSampler
    Trivial sampler that always returns a copy of the full set of indices.
